{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.00489v1", "title": "Weighted averages of $\operatorname{SL}_2(\mathbb{R})$ automorphic
  kernel, Part I: non-oscillatory functions", "summary": "We prove a theorem that evaluates weighted averages of sums parametrized by
congruence subgroups of $\operatorname{SL}_2(\mathbb{Z})$. In the proof,
spectral methods are applied directly to the automorphic kernel instead of
going over sums of Kloosterman sums. For number theoretical applications this
better preserves the specific symmetries throughout the application of spectral
methods.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT", "published": "2025-05-01T12:42:20Z"}
